decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (2013-0038-001. Received: 28/07/2016; 2013-0038-03; 2013-0038-04; Unnumbered Design and Access Statement. Received: 14/09/2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The open hours of the premises shall be as follows: Monday to Thursday: 11:00 am to 23:30 pm and Friday to Sunday: 11 am to  midnight.
Condition : 4 - The premises shall not be used for the sale of hot food for consumption off of the premises.

Condition : 5 - The hot food provision shall only consist of foods that can be prepared behind the existing counter and do not require the use of a dedicated kitchen with appliances for frying or grilling, unless a subsequent planning application for such is made to and approved by the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 6 - There shall be no outdoor seating area provided on the pavement outside the unit on High Street associated with the on-going use of the unit as an Ice Cream Parlour and/or Restaurant, unless a subsequent application is made to and approved by the Local Planning Authority.
description: Retrospective application for the change of use from A1 (Ice Cream Parlour) to A3 (Restaurant)
